EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-06-29-Customer End-User Experience Survey Enterprise.EM-Customer-Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Research Survey | $25 for 5 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{Lead.First Name}}, As a valued Turbonomic customer, you are always our number one priority in considering future product innovation and capabilities. As such, we would like your input on your usage and understanding of End-User Experience Monitoring Solutions (sometimes called real-user monitoring or synthetic monitoring).
For completing this 5-minute survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2QY6J72?marketo_iasw2ncp5s=[marketo_iasw2ncp5s_value]&marketo_oefr3x5vhs=[marketo_oefr3x5vhs_value]]]>, the first 25 respondents will receive a $25 Amazon.com Gift Card. TAKE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2QY6J72?marketo_iasw2ncp5s=[marketo_iasw2ncp5s_value]&marketo_oefr3x5vhs=[marketo_oefr3x5vhs_value]]]>
Thank you for your patronage and time!
Turbonomic Product Management Please e-mail ben.yemini@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:ben.yemini@turbomic.com]]> with any feedback or questions.
